title: What is the LCK 2017 Summer Post game song?

embed.description: Samsung Galaxy vs SK telecom T1, Game 3 - LCK Summer 2017 Playoffs Round 2 - SSG vs SKT G3 Game Start: 08:22 Esports on demand?

body: The Song Starts at 42:44 i really want to know what song is that.

replies.body: Hmmmmm it's kind of hard for me to hear the song tbh. If you're able to bump up the background volume or find a better video, you might be able to figure out that song using something like Shazam (mobile phone app for figuring out what a song is from a recording).

Ahah. Found it.


Come on from TRÃBE.

Couldnt find it anywhere, so I bought it from Amazon.
if you want the MP3, tell me.
Glad you were able to figure that out bro!
